mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_member( member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_age, member_gender, member_phone, member_email, member_address, member_join_date) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddress}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, member_pw AS memberPw FROM t_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
